metadata.title: CVE-2021-44964 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Use after free in garbage collector and finalizer of lgc.c in Lua interpreter 5.4.0~5.4.3 allows attackers to perform Sandbox Escape via a crafted script file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-44964` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblua5.4-0 - 5.4.4
lua5.4 - 5.4.4
No subscription required

advisory.discovered_by: Jihoi Kim, Sunghun Oh, Minseok Kang, MinJoong Kim, WooSun Kang, and HyungChan Kim

criterions.comment: lua5.4 package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.4').
